title: Blackberry and lemon scones
ingredients: ['115 g (4 oz) self-raising white flour, plus extra to sprinkle', '115 g (4 oz) self-raising wholemeal flour', '1 tsp baking powder', '55 g (2 oz) caster sugar', '55 g (2 oz) unsalted butter, cut into small pieces', 'finely grated zest of 1 lemon', '85 g (3 oz) small, firm, fresh blackberries', '120 ml (4 fl oz) buttermilk, or more as needed']
